intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce their insurance costs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are looking to optimize their budget or compare insurance options.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's digital tools for cost analysis and savings.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and embedded calculators.

intents.sub_intent: understanding key insurance concepts (e.g., 5 P's, 15/30/5 rule)
intents.user_motivation: Users want to make informed decisions by understanding insurance terminology.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are new to insurance or comparing policies.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's expertise to simplify complex concepts for users.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Educational blog posts with infographics and examples.

intents.sub_intent: what to avoid when dealing with insurance adjusters
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid mistakes that could impact their claims or premiums.
intents.search_context: Users search this after an accident or when filing a claim.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide trust-building advice that aligns with ING's customer-first approach.

intents.sub_intent: how to choose the best insurance policy
intents.user_motivation: Users want to identify the most suitable insurance policy for their needs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when comparing providers or preparing to purchase insurance.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Showcase ING's personalized insurance recommendations and European expertise.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Interactive tools for policy comparison and decision-making.
